qti-assessment-item.title: Create a bar graph for shapes in a bin

qti-item-body.p: A second grade classroom has a bin of shapes.

qti-choice-interaction.qti-prompt: Which bar graph correctly shows the number of shapes in the bin?

qti-content-body.p: Correct! The chosen graph perfectly matches the data provided in the table: 8 Triangles, 5 Circles, 3 Rectangles, and 9 Squares.

Not quite. Match the number of shapes from the table to the height of the bar for each shape type. For example, the table says there are 8 Triangles, so the "Triangles" bar should reach the line for the number 8 on the vertical axis.
